title: 1 bedroom Douglass Park $950
posting_body: The apartment is a one bedroom with one bathroom on the second floor.
The apartment has been recently completely renovated.
Located two blocks from Douglas Park and less than a block from the Kedzie Pink line.
There is a laundromat three blocks away.
There is a Pete's and Cermak Produce that is close to the apartment.
The location of the apartment is close to Pilsen and Little Village.
We live in a quiet block.
To get a lease; it is a $475 move in fee and first-month rent, no evictions, and income must be twice the rent and a 600 credit score.
The building is also smoke-free and there is a backyard and plenty of free parking.
One more perk is that residents of Douglas Park receive free Riotfest tickets.
